before_process.description: Time spent on manually executing each test case.

after_process.description: Time spent on writing and executing test scripts for automated testing.

before_process.description: Time spent on checking each service individually for logs.

after_process.description: Time spent on viewing logs from a single centralized dashboard.

before_process.description: Time spent on setting up individual environments for each application or service.

after_process.description: Time saved in setting up and managing environments using containers.

before_process.description: Time spent on manually changing passwords and updating them in the code.

after_process.description: Time saved by automatically changing passwords and pulling them via API. No code changes required.

before_process.description: Time spent on servers for setup / configuration / maintenance.

after_process.description: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with a centralized code repository. Update all servers at once / ensure consistency/ one click setup for new servers.

before_process.description: Time spent on manual deployment tasks.

after_process.description: Time spent on automated deployment tasks using CI/CD.

before_process.description: Time spent on creating separate versions and refactoring every deployment.

after_process.description: Time saved by avoiding refactoring and managing multiple versions using standardized templates.
